email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding the crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The starting freight rate is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Laycan is 15-20 October. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit on the higher side. Would you consider $49.50 per metric ton? Also, can we confirm the laycan as 15-20 October? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $50.00 per metric ton, which is a fair compromise. The laycan remains 15-20 October. Let me know if this works for you. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $50.00 per metric ton sounds reasonable. Let’s proceed with that. Can you confirm the demurrage rate? Also, please send over the full charter party agreement for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. I’ll send over the charter party agreement shortly. Let me know if there’s anything else you need. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The demurrage rate is acceptable. I’ll review the charter party agreement and get back to you by end of day. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, just following up to see if you’ve had a chance to review the charter party agreement. Let me know if there are any questions or changes needed. Best, Sarah
